inputs.name: X
inputs.purpose: Input Data

inputs.name: var1
inputs.purpose: First variable of the table to plot

inputs.name: var2
inputs.purpose: Second variable of the table to plot

inputs.name: var3
inputs.purpose: Third variable of the table to plot (in case of double plot)

inputs.name: var4
inputs.purpose: Fourth variable of the table to plot (in case of double plot)

inputs.name: plotType
inputs.purpose: Type of plot to produce

inputs.name: orientation
inputs.purpose: Horizontal (default) or Vertical plot

inputs.name: LabelX1
inputs.purpose: Legend label for the first set of data

inputs.name: LabelX2
inputs.purpose: Legend label for the second set of data

inputs.name: Title
inputs.purpose: Titles for each plot

inputs.name: YLabels
inputs.purpose: Tick labels for the data points

dumbbellPlot.description: Plots the Dumbbell Chart of the provided data. Table input

inputs.name: X
inputs.purpose: Input Data

inputs.name: X2
inputs.purpose: Second variable to plot

inputs.name: X3
inputs.purpose: First set of data to plot in the second graph (Only double plottype)

inputs.name: X4
inputs.purpose: Second set of data to plot in the second graph (Only double plottype)

inputs.name: plotType
inputs.purpose: Type of plot to produce

inputs.name: orientation
inputs.purpose: Horizontal (default) or Vertical plot

inputs.name: LabelX1
inputs.purpose: Legend label for the first set of data

inputs.name: LabelX2
inputs.purpose: Legend label for the second set of data

inputs.name: Title
inputs.purpose: Titles for each plot

inputs.name: YLabels
inputs.purpose: Tick labels for the data points
